channel.title: Need some coding help
channel.description:
hey, im making a 317 version of clan wars, i have set up the basic aera of it (the vast empty green landscape) and i need something that would make the two teams recognizable from each other, but not a cape. so my idea was to make one of the emotes like the d-battle axe emote for the red team and the Excalibur emote for the blue team, but im wondering how i would set about doing this :confused:
thanks if you can help :D
~shrogg
